name: SmartSuggester
description: Smart Suggester is a RAG/Agent-based application that analyzes previously solved support tickets. When a new ticket is raised, it intelligently identifies similar past cases and sends an automated email suggesting that a similar issue has already been resolved by a team member, enabling faster resolutions. (End-2-end)

name: QnA on Web: Chrome extension
description: QnA Chrome Extension Using BERT is a smart browser tool that lets users ask questions about products on e-commerce websites. It extracts the product description from the page, sends it to a BERT-based model, and provides instant, context-aware answersâ€”no training required, just plug and play.
